name: Cool Water
description:
This was a beautiful project. I had developed all the parts and was just putting it together when an update killed it. I had a character that was two tiles tall and she would face the direction that you pointed her in and when she was in the water she'd have a tank and a mask on and bob up and down in the water.

Also not finished, working jukebox, with a song and also all the dialog w/spicy hot politics.

Here it is though, unfinished.
